full_summary:
# Drab Solution
## Overview

The Department of Health (HC) at Santé Canada is seeking to acquire a Digital Solution, known as the Drab Solution, to automate the assessment process for their inspectors. The goal is to make this process more efficient, allowing inspectors to conduct assessments in less time.

## Description of the Drab Solution
The Drab Solution should utilize technology incorporating spatial recognition, pattern recognition, and color differentiation to automate the assessment of the main requirements and sub-requirements. These include 32 compliance regulation rules that are currently manually checked.

## Technical Requirements
The successful bid should propose a Digital Solution that meets the following requirements:

* Automates the assessment of 5 main requirements and 18 sub-requirements
* Incorporates 32 compliance regulation rules
* Utilizes spatial recognition, pattern recognition, and color differentiation technologies
* Is capable of integrating with existing systems and infrastructure

## Notice Details
* Solicitation Number: WS3760917676
* Amendment Number: 6
* Publication Date: 2022-12-01
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-01-20 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-01-05
* Tender Status: Expired

## Additional Information
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and others
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entities: Department of Health (HC)

## Contact Information
